title: Piggy Bank
summaries: The Piggy Bank is a portable, personal storage item which is purchased from the Merchant for 1 GC. Like other storage items (eg. Chests), it contains 40 slots (4 rows of 10) that can be used to store anything. The Piggy Bank requires only a space 2 wide and 1 high for placement, but must be placed on a Work Bench, Table, or Platforms (in contrast, the Safe, Defender's Forge(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions), and Void Vault can be placed on blocks, but are considerably larger). The Piggy Bank inventory can also be accessed via the Money Trough(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions), which summons a temporary floating version of the Piggy Bank, or the Eye Bone(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions).

Unlike normal chests etc, the Piggy bank (along with the Safe, Defender's Forge, and Void Vault) is considered "personal storage". Items contained in a Piggy Bank are attached to the character rather than to a container in the world: The bank can be picked up and moved regardless of the items within. <linked>Coins</linked> and items stored within it are safe from other players, and will not be dropped on <linked>death</linked>. They will even travel with a character who goes to a different world. However, if a <linked>Hardcore</linked> character dies, all items in their personal storage will be deleted with the character (and lost forever).
